verses.text: \w After|strong="H0310"\w* \w this|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H5984"\w*, \w were|strong="H1961"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Josaphat.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w messengers|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* Josaphat, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w There|strong="H2009"\w* cometh \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H0758"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Asasonthamar, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* Engaddi.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Josaphat being seized \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* betook \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w wholly|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w pray|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* Juda.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Juda \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* pray \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H1245"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* make supplication \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Josaphat \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* midst \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, thou art \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rulest \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w can|strong="H0369"\w* resist thee.

Didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thou \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* kill \w all|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* gavest \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H0157"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3427"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H1129"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* evils \w fall|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w judgment|strong="H8196"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H2088"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w called|strong="H2199"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* afflictions, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou wilt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* thou didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w allow|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* slew \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*,

\w Do|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w contrary|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* endeavour \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w cast|strong="H3423"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast delivered \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, wilt thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*? \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w enough|strong="H7227"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* able \w to|strong="H0935"\w* resist \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, \w which|strong="H5869"\w* cometh violently \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* only turn \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* Juda \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w little|strong="H2945"\w* \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w It|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* only \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* confidence, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w help|strong="H3444"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* ye \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*: \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5307"\w* Josaphat, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* hat \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* adored \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.
